job.title: backend developer
job.description:
Responsibilities:

Develop responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Create interactive UI components using React.js + Tailwind CSS (or Vue.js, Angular)
Design user interfaces for multiple AI features and data visualization
Utilize UI libraries like Bootstrap or Material UI for consistent styling
Implement front-end form validation and user input handling
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsive design for mobile devices
Connect front-end components with RESTful APIs using Axios/Fetch
Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate UI components with server-side logic
Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability
Participate in code reviews and implement feedback from senior developers


Qualifications:

Student or Fresh Graduate. No experience required.
Srong programming skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Basic proficiency in React.js and Tailwind CSS
Understanding of responsive design principles
Familiarity with API integration (Axios/Fetch)
Knowledge of UI/UX best practices
Basic understanding of browser rendering and performance
Ability to work independently in a remote setting


Benefits:

Opportunity to build practical skills with modern front-end technologies
Enhance your professional portfolio with real-world projects
Exposure to FinTech industry and AI applications
Remote work flexibility

job.title: UI/UX
job.aboute:
About Us

Communiqate AI is building an AI-powered platform that helps companies assess, train, and improve workplace communication skills.
We’re a fast-growing startup at the intersection of AI, communication, and learning, on a mission to make every professional a better communicator.
If you’re excited by innovation, real-world impact, and building products used globally — we’d love to have you on board.
job.description:
Position: Front-End Developer Intern - Remote
Work Mode: Remote
Internship Duration: 4 Months (First 2 Months Unpaid + Next 2 Months Paid)
Stipend: 5K - 35K Per Month
Eligibility: College Students
Internship Type: Performance-Based Continuation
Working Style: Collaborative / Online Team Workflow

job.title: react developer
job.aboute:
Job Title: React Developer Intern (Paid)
Company: WebBoost Solutions by UM
Location: Remote
Duration: 3 months
Employment Opportunity: Potential full-time role based on performance, with a Certificate of Internship.
About WebBoost Solutions by UM

WebBoost Solutions by UM provides students and graduates with practical learning opportunities and career growth in web development through real-world projects and hands-on training.
Role Overview

As a React Developer Intern, you will work on developing dynamic, responsive, and scalable web applications using React.js. This internship will help you strengthen your front-end development skills and gain real-world experience in building modern applications.
job.description:
Build and maintain responsive web applications using React / Next.js / TypeScript
Work on Android app development (native or hybrid using React Native / Flutter)
Integrate APIs and third-party SDKs (analytics, authentication, payments, etc.) ***
Handle JSON data and connect front-end interfaces with backend systems
Collaborate with backend and AI teams to develop and improve product features
Use tools like Cursor, Lovable, Git, and CI/CD to speed up development
Contribute to better user experience, performance, and basic testing
Basic knowledge of iOS build or publishing workflows is a plus

job.title: react developer
job.aboute:
Company Details
Swiggy is India’s largest on-demand convenience platform, redefining the way people access food, groceries, and everyday essentials. Established in 2014, Swiggy operates across 500+ cities with a robust logistics network that ensures fast and reliable doorstep delivery. From restaurant meals to groceries via Instamart and hyperlocal pick-up and drop services through Genie, Swiggy has become an integral part of daily life for millions of Indians, combining technology, scale, and convenience in a seamless digital experience.
Job Roles & Responsibilities
- Develop and maintain backend services using Go for logistics and food delivery platforms.
- Collaborate with cross-team peers to gather requirements and design scalable backend solutions.
- Optimize code to enhance performance and ensure system reliability within logistics solutions.
- Streamline backend operations to support immediate deployment in logistics and food tech sectors.
- Implement quality assurance to uphold industry standards in backend services.
Ideal candidate profile
- Embrace analytics for innovation in logistics using Go
- Cultivate sustainability in agri-tech solutions
- Deliver rapid contributions; adapt swiftly to change
- Forge collaborative solutions across global teams
- Navigate complex challenges in fast-paced product environments
job.description:
Architect and design end-to-end solutions using React.js for frontend and Node.js for backend services.
Define and enforce coding standards, architectural guidelines, and best practices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product managers, designers, and DevOps engineers.
Lead code reviews, mentor developers, and ensure high-quality code delivery.
Optimize application performance, scalability, and security.
Evaluate and integrate AI-powered tools to enhance development workflows and product capabilities (e.g., GitHub Copilot, Claude, RoohCode, Vertex AI, Cursor).
Stay current with emerging technologies and trends in web development and AI.


Required Skills & Qualifications
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
10+ years of experience in software development with at least 3 years in an architectural role.
Expertise in React.js, Redux, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, and RESTful APIs.
Strong understanding of microservices architecture, containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
Experience with CI/CD pipelines, unit testing, and performance tuning.
Familiarity with database technologies such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, or MySQL.
